tool_description: Calculates pressure losses throughout the propulsion system including feed lines, valves, injectors, and other flow restrictions for accurate system performance prediction.

flow_path_components.description: List of components in flow path: tank, line, valve, filter, injector, turbopump

pipe_diameters.description: Internal diameters for each pipe segment in meters

pipe_lengths.description: Lengths for each pipe segment in meters

mass_flow_rate.description: Fluid mass flow rate in kg/s (0.01 to 1000.0)

roughness.description: Pipe surface roughness in meters (1e-6 to 1e-3)

error_messages: Invalid flow path components: Each component must be one of [tank, line, valve, filter, injector, turbopump]
Array size mismatch: pipe_diameters and pipe_lengths arrays must have same length
Component count mismatch: Number of pipe segments must match flow path complexity
Mass flow rate out of range: Value must be between 0.01 and 1000.0 kg/s
Fluid density out of range: Value must be between 1.0 and 10000.0 kg/m³
Fluid viscosity out of range: Value must be between 1e-6 and 1e-2 Pa·s
Pipe diameter out of range: All diameters must be between 0.001 and 10.0 meters
Pipe length out of range: All lengths must be between 0.01 and 1000.0 meters
Surface roughness out of range: Value must be between 1e-6 and 1e-3 meters
usage: Define the flow path using flow_path_components array, specify corresponding pipe_diameters and pipe_lengths, and provide fluid properties (mass_flow_rate, fluid_density, fluid_viscosity). Optionally set surface roughness. Tool calculates pressure losses for system sizing.

total_pressure_drop.description: Total system pressure drop in bar

friction_losses.description: Friction losses for each pipe segment in bar

minor_losses.description: Minor losses for each component in bar

reynolds_numbers.description: Reynolds numbers for each pipe segment

flow_velocities.description: Flow velocities in each segment in m/s
